title: Silly Helvetica movie on YouTube
content:
In the tradition of the BBC via Monty Python... Ricardo Cordoba apologizes for posting a link to this silly movie:

[http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fXBQ4N2Sp74](http://web.archive.org/web/20071108215630/http:/www.youtube.com/watch?v=fXBQ4N2Sp74 "http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fXBQ4N2Sp74")

 [‹ is anyone watching BBC1 right now?](http://web.archive.org/web/20071108215630/http:/www.typophile.com/node/38870 "Go to previous forum topic") [an odd mangling of text. ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071108215630/http:/www.typophile.com/node/38867 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Ricardo Cordoba
